ygData.subject: Re: Estate of Unrest
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/20/99 5:03:55 PM EST, Jim.Saiveau@hboc.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/20/99 5:03:55 PM EST, Jim.Saiveau@... writes:

<< I was planning a trip to Unrest tonight and was wondering if anyone had
any info on it that may be useful. Is it decent for a lvl 23 to solo? I
heard that there's usually alot of people there, so the risk of getting hit
by more than one MOB is low. Also, is there anywhere in Faydwer for a DE to
sell? As an outcast I was pretty sure there wasn't..... >>


Unrest is not a solo spot you'll do alot better getting in a group.....as for
selling try the druid ring in BB near the crossroads (hard to find you may
want to look at a map first )> No where to bank though so 2 days is max I
could stay without heading home to neriak.

Zakrell Lu'Dan
